5’10 170lbs, sized up to an XL. These fit perfectly! For being an XL, the waistband is definitely on the smaller side, but they’re not uncomfortable. I actually didn’t find these itchy like other reviews mentioned and think they’re super cute! I’m glad I bought.

i love these shorts. they are simple, casual yet cute, and a really sweet aesthetic. the buttons are a nice touch as well. the only small turn off is the fabric, it feels thick and weird but it's not something that will make your head explode or anything.
